formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Required parameter. Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Required parameter. Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Startup Script:
formElement.documentation: Required parameter. Provide the absolute physical path of the standalone script, i.e: 'standalone.bat', '/usr/tools/bin/standalone.sh', 'c:/Program Files/JBoss/bin/standalone.bat'.

formElement.label: Server Configuration File:
formElement.documentation: Optional parameter. Name of the server configuration file to use (stands for '--server-config' option for standalone startup script). For example: standalone-full.xml, standalone-full-ha.xml. By default standalone.xml is used.

formElement.label: Additional Options:
formElement.documentation: Optional parameter. 'Additional options' to be passed on to standalone startup script. The parameters mentioned in this string will be concatenated to already generated command line for starting JBoss as a Standalone Server. For example: -b=0.0.0.0 -bmanagement=0.0.0.0

formElement.label: Log File Location:
formElement.documentation: Optional parameter. Absolute path location to server log file. For example, /opt/jboss/standalone/log/server.log . If provided the procedure will the most recent 100 log lines from the specified file and surface them in the procedure summary logs.
